Package com.example.genzgpt.Controller

Class Firebase

java.lang.Object
com.example.genzgpt.Controller.Firebase
public class Firebase extends Object
This class is responsible for handling all interactions with Firebase.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    Firebase.OnAttendeeRegisteredListener
    A listener for when Attendees are registered in Firebase.
    static interface 
    Firebase.OnAttendeeRemovedListener
    A listener for when Attendees are removed from Firebase.
    static interface 
    Firebase.OnCheckInAttendeesLoadedListener
    A listener for when attendees check into an event through Firebase.
    static interface 
    Firebase.OnEventLoadedListener
    A listener for when an event is loaded from Firebase.
    static interface 
    Firebase.OnEventsLoadedListener
    A listener for when multiple events are loaded from Firebase.
    static interface 
    Firebase.OnEventUpdatedListener
    A listener for an event being updated in Firebase.
    static interface 
    Firebase.OnLocationsRetrievedListener
    A listener for when a location is retrieved from Firebase.
    static interface 
    Firebase.OnRegisteredAttendeesLoadedListener
    A listener for when a list of registered attendees are loaded from Firebase.
    static interface 
    Firebase.OnUploadCompleteListener
    Callback interface for handling upload completion.
    static interface 
    Firebase.OnUserCreatedListener
    A listener for when a user is created in Firebase.
    static interface 
    Firebase.OnUserEventsLoadedListener
    A listener for when a user's events are loaded from Firebase.
    static interface 
    Firebase.OnUserLoadedListener
     
    static interface 
    Firebase.OnUsersLoadedListener
    A listener for when multiple users are loaded from Firebase.
    static interface 
    Firebase.OnUserUpdatedListener
    A listener for when a user is updated in the Firebase.

    • uploadImageForEvent

      public static void uploadImageForEvent(String eventID, android.net.Uri imageUri, android.app.ProgressDialog progressDialog, android.content.Context context)
      Uploads an image to Firebase Storage and associates it with the specified event.
      Parameters:
      eventID - ID of the event to associate with the image.
      imageUri - Uri of the image to upload.
      progressDialog - Progress dialog for showing upload progress.
      context - Context for displaying toasts.

      Parameters:
      userID - ID of the event to associate with the image.
      imageUri - Uri of the image to upload.
      progressDialog - Progress dialog for showing upload progress.
      context - Context for displaying toasts.

      Returns:

    • removeUserFromRegisteredAttendees

      public void removeUserFromRegisteredAttendees(String eventId, String userId, Firebase.OnAttendeeRemovedListener listener)
      removes the current user from the list of registered attendees for a specific event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - the id for the event that registered attendees will be removed from
      userId - the id of the user that will be removed from the list of registered attendees
      listener - the listener for the removal of the user from the list of registered attendees

    • reusePastEvent

      public void reusePastEvent(String userId, String eventId, String newEventName, Date newEventDate, String newLocation, int newMaxAttendees, String newImageURL, Firebase.OnEventUpdatedListener listener)
      Change a past event into a new event, so the organizer can reuse the event ID. This will allow them to reuse QR codes that are associated with the event ID. It empties the list of registered attendees, checked-in attendees, and organizers. It then adds the current user as the organizer. It also clears the corresponding check-in data for the event.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the current user
      eventId - the event that will be updated
      newEventName - the new name for the event
      newEventDate - the new date for the event
      newLocation - the new location for the event
      newMaxAttendees - the new maximum number of attendees for the event
      newImageURL - the new image URL for the event
      listener - the listener for the event update

    • retrieveLocations

      public void retrieveLocations(String eventName, Firebase.OnLocationsRetrievedListener listener)
      Retrieves Geopoints from the list of locations in the firebase These locations will be used to check where attendees are checking in from
      Parameters:
      eventName - The name of the event to retrieve locations for.
      listener - Listener for handling locations retrieval.

    • addLocationToEvent

      public void addLocationToEvent(String eventName, com.google.firebase.firestore.GeoPoint location)
      either creates the location list in the event, if it doesn't exist, or adds a new location to the list These will be stored as geopoints in the firebase
      Parameters:
      eventName - The name of the event to add the location to.
      location - The location to add.

    • fetchCheckedInAttendeesPlusToken

      public void fetchCheckedInAttendeesPlusToken(String eventId, Firebase.OnCheckInAttendeesLoadedListener listener)
